name: Potion Mixup
description:
Disclaimer:Not nearly complete but barely playable.  Some build issues such as not being able to move horizontal unless jumping

Controls: WD and Space for movement and jumping. After clicking two potions in inventory, right-click to launch potion.

They could be different ways of helping you defeat enemies like bombs or poison or bad mixtures which can spawn enemies or blow up in your face(hurting you in theory but damage towards the player is not implemented only towards enemies.)
